message: I'd kind of like the message to be shorter or the font to be smaller. Maybe it could be a proportional font or have a picture of an octocat.
I like my narrow tumblr theme but it's causing the "This Gist brought to you by Github" message to be wrapped.
just use CSS to fix it yourself.
Great idea @justinlilly! I fixed it by adding .gist { font-size: 95%; } Now it's all on one line.
